entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20 with temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 8:42 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 8:42 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 8:42 PM MST Thursday 29 December 2022
